item.title: Daniel add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Daniel add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "A man with outward courage dares to die; a man with inner courage dares to live." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Sun Tzu
item.description: "Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win" -- Sun Tzu

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "To lead people, walk beside them ... As for the best leaders, the people do not notice their existence. The next best, the people honor and praise. The next, the people fear; and the next, the people hate ... When the best leader's work is done the people say, We did it ourselves!" -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Daniel add a quote by John Emerich Edward Dalberg Acton
item.description: "Power tends to corrupt, and absolute power corrupts absolutely." -- John Emerich Edward Dalberg Acton

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Lord Acton
item.description: "Learn as much by writing as by reading" -- Lord Acton
